nodes.text: The suicide shocker was a suicide-assisting electric shocking device that could be implanted in a human's mouth. The device could be activated by biting down, resulting in a fatal electric shock to the individual's head. On Trask, an Imperial captain used the device when he rather than give the location of his superior while being interrogated by the Mandalorian Lady Bo-Katan Kryze.
The suicide shocker first appeared in "Chapter 11: The Heiress," and was identified in the episode's descriptive audio.
